# About this project

CARS is a web application is intended to help with the management of vehicles repairs, from the diagnostic to the billing. Its usage is expected to be intuitive and user-friendly.

> The only available language is French, and it is not intended to be adapted for other languages, given the user panel it is designed for.

> This application is expected to run correctly on the 2 last major versions of Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox web browsers. Any other web browser or version won't be supported.

# Versions

> For detailed information about the versions, check the [releases](https://github.com/Foacs/cars/releases).

# Getting Started

## Prerequisites

In order to set up the project, you need to have [Node JS](https://nodejs.org/) (version 16.16.0 or higher) installed.

## Installation

1. Clone the repository

````shell
> git clone https://github.com/Foacs/cars.git
````

2. Move to the root directory of the repository

````shell
> cd cars
````

3. Run `npm install` to download all the needed dependencies

```shell
> npm install
```

4. Run `npm start` to start the application

```shell
> npm start
```

## Technologies

* [Node JS](https://nodejs.org/): `16.16.0`
* [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/): `8.11.0`
* [React JS](https://reactjs.org/): `18.2.0`
* [Material UI](https://mui.com/): `5.9.2`
